dict.acceptation: 你，恁；你们，您们；各位；大家；

sent.orig: In "if I were you" the verb "were" is in the subjunctive.
sent.trans: 在“If I were you”中动词“were”是虚拟语气。

sent.orig: Mountaineers rely on the mountains, just like those by the waterside profit from water.; If you live on a mountain, you live off the mountain; if you live by the water, you live off the water.
What time is it now?; What is the time?; Have you the right time?; Can you tell me the time?; What o'clock is it?; What time do you like it?; What do you make the time?
Whether you go or not is up to you.; You may go or not, as you wish.
